00086 class FunctionParameterValueBase {
00087     public:
00089 
00091         struct WrongParameterTypeException: public std::logic_error {
00092             WrongParameterTypeException(const std::string &_class,
00093                                         const std::string &_function,
00094                                         const std::string &_type):
00095                 std::logic_error("Tried to call default implementation for "+
00096                                  _class+"::"+_function+"("+_type+")!") { }
00097         };
00098 
00099         /* I have to declare the getters and setters for every type of
00100            derived classes that will be instantiated. PITA.
00101            what's worse, i have to define no-ops as default implementation,
00102            because otherwise the templated derived class would remain
00103            abstract. that totally breaks type-safety during compilation.      */
00105         virtual void setValue(const double &) {
00106             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00107                                               "setValue", "double");
00108         }
00110         virtual void setValue(const unsigned &) {
00111             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00112                                               "setValue", "unsigned");
00113         }
00115         virtual void setValue(const int &) {
00116             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00117                                               "setValue", "int");
00118         }
00120         virtual void setValue(const std::string &) {
00121             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00122                                               "setValue", "std::string");
00123         }
00124 
00125         virtual void setValue(const char *) = 0;
00126 
00127         virtual operator double() = 0;                  
00128         virtual operator unsigned() = 0;                
00129         virtual operator int() = 0;                     
00130         virtual operator std::string() = 0;             
00131 
00132         virtual std::string toString() = 0;             
00133     };
00134 
00136 
00147 template <typename T> class FunctionParameterValue:
00148         public FunctionParameterValueBase {
00149     public:
00150         FunctionParameterValue<T>(const T &_value): value(_value) { }
00151 
00153         virtual void setValue(const char *);
00154 
00157         virtual operator double() {
00158             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue",
00159                                               "operator double", "");
00160             return 0.;
00161         }
00162 
00165         virtual operator unsigned() {
00166             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue",
00167                                               "operator unsigned", "");
00168             return 0;
00169         }
00170 
00173         virtual operator int() {
00174             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue",
00175                                               "operator int", "");
00176              return 0;
00177         }
00178 
00181         virtual operator std::string() {
00182             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue",
00183                                               "operator std::string", "");
00184              return "";
00185         }
00186 
00187         virtual std::string toString() {
00188             std::ostringstream o;
00189             o << value << std::ends;
00190             return o.str();
00191         }
00192     private:
00193         T value;
00194 };
00195 
00197 
00216 class FunctionParameter {
00217     public:
00218         FunctionParameter(const std::string &_name,
00219                           const std::string &_description = "");
00220         ~FunctionParameter();
00221 
00223         operator double();
00225         operator unsigned();
00227         operator int();
00229         operator std::string();
00230 
00232         const std::string &getName() const;
00234         void setName(const std::string &_name);
00236         const std::string &getDescription() const;
00238         void setDescription(const std::string &_description);
00239 
00241 
00245         template<typename T> void setValue(FunctionParameterValue<T> *_value) {
00246             pImpl->value.reset ( _value );
00247         }
00248 
00250         void setValue(std::string _value);
00251 
00253 
00257         template<typename T> void setDefaultValue(FunctionParameterValue<T> *_defaultValue ) {
00258             pImpl->defaultValue.reset(_defaultValue);
00259         }
00260 
00261         FunctionParameterValueBase *value() const;
00262         FunctionParameterValueBase *defaultValue() const;
00263 
00264     private:
00265         //  these accessors are never used, but i like to keep them around
00266 //         std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> value() {
00267 //             return pImpl->value;
00268 //         }
00269 //         const std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> value() const {
00270 //             return pImpl->value;
00271 //         }
00272 //         std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> defaultValue() {
00273 //             return pImpl->defaultValue;
00274 //         }
00275 
00277         struct Impl {
00278             Impl(const std::string &_name,
00279                           const std::string &_description = ""):
00280                     name(_name), description(_description), value(0),
00281                     defaultValue(0) {}
00282             ~Impl() { }
00283             std::string name;
00284             std::string description;
00285             std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> value;
00286             std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> defaultValue;
00287         };
00288         Impl *pImpl;
00289 };

00292 
00294 class ParameterFac {
00295     public:
00297         template <typename T>
00298                 FunctionParameter *createParameterWithValue(
00299                     const std::string &_name, const T &_value) {
00300             FunctionParameter *tmp = new FunctionParameter(_name);
00301             tmp->setValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_value));
00302 
00303             return tmp;
00304         }
00305 
00307         template <typename T>
00308                 FunctionParameter *createParameterWithDefault(
00309                     const std::string &_name, const T &_default,
00310                     const std::string &_description = "") {
00311             FunctionParameter *tmp = new FunctionParameter(_name, _description);
00312             tmp->setDefaultValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_default));
00313             tmp->setValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_default));
00314 
00315             return tmp;
00316         }
00317 };

00323 typedef Loki::SingletonHolder<ParameterFac> ParameterFactory;
